title: Google Expands Gemini Nano for On-Device AI üì±
full: Google expanded Gemini Nano for on-device AI features such as smart replies, offline summarization, and voice assistance. The focus is faster performance without internet dependency.

title: OpenAI Tests Improved Reasoning Models üß†
full: OpenAI has started internal testing of improved reasoning-focused AI models designed to reduce hallucinations and improve multi-step problem solving accuracy.

title: Microsoft Copilot Gets Deeper Windows Integration ü™ü
full: Microsoft rolled out deeper Copilot integration across Windows 11 apps, enabling smarter file search, automation, and contextual AI assistance inside the OS.

title: Meta Improves AI Safety and Content Filters üîê
full: Meta announced new AI safety systems to better detect harmful prompts, deepfakes, and misleading AI-generated content across its platforms.

title: Amazon Pushes Lightweight AI Models for Alexa ‚ö°
full: Amazon introduced lightweight AI models that run locally on Alexa devices, reducing cloud usage and delivering faster, privacy-friendly responses.

title: NVIDIA Reveals New AI Video Generation Research üé•
full: NVIDIA researchers showcased new AI systems capable of generating realistic short videos from text prompts with better motion consistency.

title: Anthropic Launches Faster Claude Mini üöÄ
full: Anthropic released a faster and more efficient Claude Mini model optimized for mobile and low-power devices while keeping strong reasoning abilities.

title: IBM Says Data Quality Is Blocking AI Growth üìä
full: IBM warned that poor data quality and siloed systems are the biggest barriers preventing companies from scaling AI effectively.

title: AI Adoption Rapidly Transforms Job Roles üîÑ
full: New reports show AI adoption is rapidly changing job roles worldwide, increasing demand for AI-skilled professionals while automating routine work.

title: Global AI Infrastructure Investment Keeps Rising üíπ
full: Global investment in AI infrastructure including data centers, chips, and cloud platforms continued to rise sharply over the past 10 days.
